verses.text: \w And|strong="H0559"\w* \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w* made \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*,

Truly, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w been|strong="H2388"\w* \w a|strong="H2388"\w* helper \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w others|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w feeble|strong="H7504"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*;

He who was near \w to|strong="H6965"\w* falling has been lifted \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w by|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H6965"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w you|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* given \w strength|strong="H0553"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* bent \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* weariness \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* are \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* mind \w is|strong="H0935"\w* troubled.

\w Is|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* support, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w upright|strong="H8537"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* life \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*?

Have \w you|strong="H2142"\w* \w ever|strong="H4310"\w* seen \w destruction|strong="H0006"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H2142"\w* an \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* man? \w or|strong="H2142"\w* \w when|strong="H2142"\w* were \w the|strong="H2142"\w* god-fearing \w ever|strong="H4310"\w* \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w*?

\w By|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w destruction|strong="H0006"\w* takes \w them|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w by|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H3615"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w they|strong="H0639"\w* \w are|strong="H0639"\w* cut off.

Though \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* sounding \w of|strong="H6963"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, may \w be|strong="H6963"\w* loud, \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w broken|strong="H5421"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w lion|strong="H3918"\w* comes \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* end \w for|strong="H0006"\w* need \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w food|strong="H2964"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* she-lion \w go|strong="H6504"\w* \w wandering|strong="H0006"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* all directions.

\w A|strong="H3947"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* given \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* secretly, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* low sound \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* troubled thoughts \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w visions|strong="H2384"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w* comes \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*,

\w Fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w came|strong="H7122"\w* on me \w and|strong="H6343"\w* shaking, \w and|strong="H6343"\w* \w my|strong="H6106"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w were|strong="H6343"\w* full \w of|strong="H7230"\w* trouble;

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w was|strong="H7307"\w* moving \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*; \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* became stiff:

\w Something|strong="H4758"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w present|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H5234"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w see|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* clearly; \w there|strong="H5975"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w form|strong="H8544"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w a|strong="H8085"\w* quiet \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* came \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* ears, \w saying|strong="H6963"\w*:

Truly, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w puts|strong="H7760"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w faith|strong="H0539"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* sees \w error|strong="H8417"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w*;

\w How|strong="H0834"\w* \w much|strong="H0637"\w* \w more|strong="H0637"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w living|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* bases \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*! \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w crushed|strong="H1792"\w* \w more|strong="H0637"\w* quickly than \w an|strong="H6440"\w* insect;

Between \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w they|strong="H1242"\w* are completely \w broken|strong="H0006"\w*; \w they|strong="H1242"\w* come \w to|strong="H1242"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w* \w for|strong="H6153"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w one|strong="H1097"\w* \w takes|strong="H7760"\w* note.
